remarks: Define the quotient of two univariate polynomials, which is guaranteed to exist and be unique by ~ ply1divalg .  We actually use the reversed version for better harmony with our divisibility ~ df-dvdsr . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
